metadata.name: Lasith Fernando - Mathaka Mal - මතක මල්
metadata.description:
**[Mathaka Mal (මතක මල්)](https://open.spotify.com/track/0bDKVJhqfYK7esFUtx9M19?si=d56f3699ac55450d) is the first single released by Sri Lankan singer, songwriter, guitarist [Lasith Fernando](https://open.spotify.com/artist/2xh2NJ4TeqUAqtIQHubCTG?si=tMv1Gb6kQjCccD_I42S7Pw).**  

**This NFT is a digital collectible minted on the [Music x Lasith Fernando](https://opensea.io/collection/musicbylasithfernando) custom smart contract.**  

---

**Artist:** Lasith Fernando  
**Written & Composed by:** Lasith Fernando  
**Recorded at:** Paragon Muzik Studio  
**Mixed & Mastered by:** Ravin Ratnam  
**Release Date:** January 20th, 2017  

**Collection:** Music x Lasith Fernando  
**Edition:** 1/500 ERC-1155 token  

---
